bill_title: prohibit a person from coercing an individual to submit to certain vaccinations.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to prohibit a person from coercing an individual to submit to certain vaccinations. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 34-22-6 be AMENDED: 34-22-6. It is a Class 2 misdemeanor for any board, physician, or person to compel another individual by the use of physical force, or to coerce another individual, to submit to the operation of a vaccination with for smallpox or other virus.
